ing: 2 cups fresh or frozen unsweetened strawberries
4 teaspoons granular no-calorie sucralose sweetener (e.g., Splenda Â®)
des: "A yummy breakfast treat or a low-guilt dessert. You can substitute vanilla wafers for shortbread cookies if you wish."
ins: Place the yogurt, milk, strawberries, cookies, sweetener, vanilla, and optional protein powder into a blender. Cover, and puree until smooth. Pour into glasses to serve.
